#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int r(char c) {
    int k;
    switch(c) {
        case 'C': k = 1;
        break;
        case 'c': k = 2;
        break;
        case 'D': k = 3;
        break;
        case 'd': k = 4;
        break;
        case'E': k = 5;
        break;
        case 'F': k = 6;
        break;
        case 'f': k = 7;
        break;
        case 'G': k = 8;
        break;
        case 'g': k = 9;
        break;
        case 'A': k = 10;
        break;
        case 'B': k = 11;
        break;
        case 'S': k = 12;
        break;
        }
    return k;
    }
int main() {
    int t;
    int a, b, c, d, e;
    char x, y, z;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--) {
        cin >> x >> y >> z;
        a = r(x);
        b = r(y);
        c = r(z);
        d = b - a;
        if (d < 0) d = 12+d;
        if (d == 4) printf("Major\n");
        else printf("Minor\n");
        }
    return 0;
    }
